column4: anybody here use grome launch box? (it's like MacOS Quicksilver)
that is buggy at best a one-day hack
on a forum, the screenshots look nice: http://forums.blacktree.com/viewtopic.php?t=1751
not much to be done about that
if you get a segmentation fault then that is too bad, but there is not much that can done about the app itself - it was not meant to be used by the public
so it is in repos for developers?
you don't use it? or are you telling me not to use it?
i tried it once, took pictures and sent it on its way to its rightful place
what would be the best gnome app that does what quicksilver does on gnome.
